articles.description: Ample could change between now and December’s national AFL draft, considering clubs now have the ability to trade picks in the lead-up to – and on the night of – the big event.
articles.content:
But it already seems the fortunes of the draft will be dictated by six clubs for many different reasons.
It was announced last week that this years national draft would be held on just the one night… [+7205 chars]
